storyInfo: The group learns that the collective consciousness of the unconscious test subjects is what drives the mysterious creatures, revealing the terrifying true purpose of the experiments. Saria guesses at Ferdinand's ambitions, while multiple attempts are made to synchronize with Ptilopsis.

attributes.content: The massive machine sits silent in the darkness.
The intertwining tubes are like sprawling rhizomes, shoots growing out at the ends.
Each shoot is an electrode glowing faintly, absorbing nutrition from the lifeform underneath.
The missing Pioneers lie side by side, electrodes on their heads.
They breathe and their hearts beat, but they are oblivious to what is happening around them.
A silvery liquid flows through the tubes, converging on the device at the center of the room.
It seems more alive than the dozens of catatonic test subjects.
How could this be...?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: ...Helen?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Why...?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Dirk! Gale! Sophia!
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: They're all here...
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Let them go.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Please, keep your voice down. Don't startle them.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Wait here a while, my friends... everything will be alright, once I take care of this little problem. I promise.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Are you talking to them? I doubt they can hear you.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I've never seen symptoms like these... except on the unconscious Joyce.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: The electrodes and the silver liquid... they're connected to their central nervous systems, aren't they?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Dorothy... why is Helen here?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: She was worried that she would fail Ferdinand's test. I made a suggestion.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: A suggestion... to become a test subject?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Helen was chatting with us just this morning. Now she lies here as conscious as a plank of wood.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: I want to help her, Elena.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: I can feel her pain... just like I feel all of theirs.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Helen's debts are weighing an entire family down.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: She lives in constant fear... she would take her own life if Ferdinand fired her.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: To stop now would be to deliver them into the hands of merciless fate.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: I can't do something so cruel.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Stop.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Stop with the self-righteousness already, or I can't promise I'll keep my finger off the trigger.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Your hatred of me stems from your lack of understanding of what you see, and of me.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: But I understand you.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Like hell you do!
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: You understand us so well you'll oh so benevolently give us a chance at a new life. Instead of dying in a Catastrophe or getting eaten by monsters...
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: We get to be technically-alive half-corpses in the lab of a big corporation!
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Where do I line up to kiss your feet?!
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Have you never thought about it, Sonny? Why is it that some people with Oripathy can keep working, while others are forced to leave their homes?
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Don't need you to tell me.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: The day after I got diagnosed, I found my insurance contract and pink slip waiting for me.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: The contract was five hundred and sixty-nine pages. The sheet telling me I was fired didn't fill half the paper.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: There aren't a lot of companies out there willing to hire an Infected. We gotta prove we're worth that outrageous insurance premium.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Sigh...
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Don't you think it's unfair?
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Kinda goes without saying, doesn't it?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Then you should understand.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: I can't reach Silence or Greyy.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: The site must be entirely closed off.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Fer...dinand...
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Closing off the lab is just the means, not the end.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Ferdinand is planning something at Site 359.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Doctor, Silence and the others are in danger.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: We're not getting anything from the site... should we move to assist?
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: True... data transmission from Device #9 is different from standard communication. We only need a moment's signal to see what Ptilopsis is seeing.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: I'll try to sync up with her.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Are you sure you want to meet with him alone, Miss Franks?
Yes, I have permission from the bureau.
They say that man, Loken Williams, is a complete nutjob. He got a hundred years in prison for his cruel human experimentation.
I know. I've sat in his lectures before.
These scientists are out of their minds... oh, sorry, I forgot you were a scientist too. But you're such a gentle and elegant lady. Surely you're not like them!
I understand. Thank you for being concerned about my safety. I'll be careful.
How long do you expect you'll be in there?
An hour. I can come back again same time next week, if necessary.
You want to talk to him that badly? He doesn't usually care about other people...
Maybe it's because of all the things people ask him for, I'm the only one asking for help.
Everyone deserves a chance, we should all have equal access to opportunity. Differences in talent should not determine one's destiny.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: When someone with talent becomes privileged because of that talent, they are infringing on someone else's interests, undermining fairness.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: I'm among the privileged. And I'm ashamed of my 'luck.'
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: I wanted to pull you out of the bog before it swallowed you—Dirk, Helen, and you, Sonny.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: I have done all this in the hopes that one day, fortune will smile only upon those who work hard, rather than favor the so-called 'talented'.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: I've spent many years working towards this goal.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Altering the individual to make it stronger does not solve the problem.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Those who were born strong can be even stronger with the same alterations, widening the gap even further.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: In order to achieve true equality, I must...
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: You wanted to eliminate individual differences?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: The unconscious test subjects... Originium Arts constructs with emotional responses... a massive machine that links them together...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Your experiments... they're...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I've heard of something like them before, but I thought it was just a mad dream, one that failed a long time ago.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Mad dream?
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: There's no such thing as 'mad' science. It's just a means to an end.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: We can't ignore or forget the innate differences between individuals, but that doesn't mean we have to be burdened by them forever.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: My technology will allow people to stand before each other as equals, sharing equally the soil, the air, and the rain.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: No longer will their footsteps be stopped by mountains, nor their sight be obstructed by storms.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: They will look into the distance from a place of safety, without having to endure the toil of long journeys and separation from their loved ones.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Don't you understand the beauty of such a future?
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Did I never actually understand...?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: What exactly were we doing here?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: We've been looking for the caster behind the silver constructs.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: We thought it was the individual Pioneers, but we were wrong.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: The caster was all of them.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: You have sharp eyes, Dr. Silence.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Director Franks, the future you imagine is just that... your imagination.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I see something different.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: A skilled Originium Arts caster can destroy a building. Three skilled casters can suppress an entire city block.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: What would happen if you joined the power of ten people, a hundred people, a thousand people?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Nothing under the sun will escape its gaze. The strongest fortress will be little more than a toy that it could crush with a thought.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: As for the people you care about, the ones you call friends... they will never be more than test subjects in the eyes of those who want to harness the technology.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Those who fail will be the lucky ones. They'll be ignored, allowed to live and die on their own.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: A worse fate befalls those who succeed.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: The day their experiment succeeds, they'll be doomed to live under the watchful eyes of corporations and governments.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Olivia... I've never seen you like this...
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: This angry.
Silence can feel her own anger, like a humming in her mind. Scenes from the past flash across her eyes, as she feels her reason and calm disintegrate.
You may have changed their destiny, but at what price? They'll lose their freedom forever, their lives no longer their own.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: ...I'll protect them.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: If it costs my very life.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Killing you, right here, right now just might be best for everyone.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: If that's your consensus...
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Then I won't resist.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Don't lose your head, Sonny!
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Lose my head, Doc?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: I'm calmer than I've ever been.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Dorothy Franks... I gotta admit, the picture of the future you're painting has some appeal.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Same as how I almost walked into your lab... you don't know how many times I thought about taking your hand.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Why didn't you?
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Because my future... belongs to me.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: The things you say, not to mention the look of you there... the more welcoming the whole deal, the clearer I see it...
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: You're controlling us.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: It's harder to break out of a sweet dream than a nightmare.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Maybe you're living that dream, Director Franks, but the rest of us are here facing reality.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Doc Silence was right. An experiment like this should never have existed to begin with.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: The lands across our world have given birth to enough madness. This kinda madness oughta get buried deep, and never dug up again.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Whatever it costs.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: We gotta put a stop to this.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Olivia! Make Sonny listen!
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Whatever came of it... Dorothy was only trying to help these people.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Even if I thought she needed to be stopped, to be punished, it shouldn't end like this... not by the ones she truly loved...
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Sonny...
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Joyce?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: You... you're awake?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Don't hurt Director Franks.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Synchronization failed.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: The situation at Site 359 may be worse than we thought.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Uhh...
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Thank you for the help, Dr. {@nickname}.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: I can feel my legs now.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.options: Site 359 is about more than just Rhine Lab.;Ferdinand is working with more powerful forces.

attributes.content: You know who Ferdinand is working with, don't you, Saria?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: The power armor you've been tracking just might end up in the hands of those who most need cutting-edge weaponry.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: You've seen them. Evidence?
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: You'll have it.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: That warmth I felt back there, that was a little wishful thinky on my part, huh? I put my life on the line to get the evidence you wanted.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Our hypothesis was right.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Ferdinand is no longer hiding his ambition.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.options: He's leveraging this experiment to garner support...

attributes.content: ...and he'll use it to seize control of Rhine Lab.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: We have to find Kirsten. She is Ferdinand's prime target.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Did you get my last message, Saria?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: My contacts inside Rhine say everything is normal.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: That's because they're used to Control's absence.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Ferdinand's been planning this for years, undermining Control's authority, little by little... this experiment is the last step.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Or maybe not the last one...
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: I hadn't been in contact with Kirsten for a week before they got me.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: What about the site?
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: I wouldn't be too worried about Dr. Silence. I still remember that time she got the upper hand of me.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: This is no time for indecision, Saria.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: You have to make a choice.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: This is no multiple choice question, Doctor.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: The key to resolving the situation at the site is Ferdinand, and the key to taking care of Ferdinand lies before us.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.options: Let's go see the Control of Rhine.
